great game   they took everything about the first game and made it better   i was disappointed at the shallow scope of each system ie the ship has an upgrade system that allows for 2 aux upgrades only 2 upgrades capts quarters and petting zoo exist in the entire country   all in all it feels like a game that was meant to be much larger cut in half then capped off   its really good despite that recommended
